typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Gut_Date_Given as timestamp,
		Gut_Guarantee_Issued_To as string,
		Gut_Guarantee_Remarks as string,
		Gut_Date_Expiry as timestamp,
		Gut_Date_Created as timestamp,
		Gut_Key as string,
		Gut_Type_Description as string,
		Gut_Guarantee_Status as string,
		Gut_Inc_Key as string,
		Gut_open_ind as string,
		Gut_Guarantee_type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_guarantee_pa.parquet']) ~> PreDimGuarantee
PreDimGuarantee derive(Top_key = 'N/A',
		Top_Description = 'All Guarantees') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_guarantee.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
